name: Global Tech Conference 2025
description: Global tech conferences are major events that bring together industry leaders, policymakers, and experts to discuss current trends, emerging technologies, and the impact of technology on global issues

name: AI & Machine Learning Summit
description: The AI & Machine Learning Summit is a 2-day immersion into the possibilities inherent in an AI-driven future, offering the opportunity to harness AI & ML's transformative potentil

name: Digital Marketing Conference
description: Digital marketing conferences are events that bring together professionals, experts, and innovators in the field of online marketing to share insights, strategies, and the latest trends

name: Startup Founders Forum
description: Our community includes the world’s most inspiring founders, pioneering investors, inventive CEOs, and impactful leaders. Together, we champion entrepreneurial innovation and put the needs of today’s founders first, via networking & events, education, professional services, investment, and philanthropy.

name: Healthcare Innovation Conference
description: his event brings together public sector executives, industry experts, and changemakers committed to transforming healthcare through digital innovation. Dive deep into the latest trends and technologies that are revolutionizing patient outcomes, improving efficiency, and redefining care delivery standards.

name: Women in Tech Conference
description: ​​​​​​The virtual-first conference will bring women in tech, minorities and allies from all over the world together through an interactive platform featuring live educational & training content, keynotes, engaging panels, breakout rooms, technical workshops, and networking with virtual and in-person sessions.

name: Blockchain & Fintech Summit
description: The Global Fintech & Blockchain Conference is the largest university-led blockchain and financial technology conference in the world. It attracts top-tier university talent in addition to professionals, from all over Europe and beyond and features top founders and leaders from the most pioneering companies, funds, corporates and more.

name: Green Energy Conference
description: Presented papers will be published in the Abstracts E-book of the Conference. Those communications considered to have enough quality can be further considered for publication in International Conference Journals. At the authors’ choice, those works not suitable for publication in any congress journals will be published in the Extended Proceedings E-book.

name: UX/UI Design Conference
description: Whether you're a beginner taking your first steps or an established professional looking to stay on top of your game, UX design conferences are invaluable for learning and networking. They offer a chance to delve deeper into various disciplines—from User Research to UX Design Leadership—providing critical insights and new developments.

name: DevOps & Cloud Expo
description: DevOps Live unites thousands of DevOps enthusiasts, thought leaders, and industry practitioners. It’s the preferred platform for forward-thinking innovators in cloud technology who aim to make a significant impact.This is your exclusive opportunity to connect with pioneers, experts, and decision-makers, and showcase your offerings to genuine buyers actively seeking solutions and services to enhance productivity, accelerate time to market, and elevate customer experiences

name: Cybersecurity Leaders Meet
description: Prevailing geopolitical uncertainty, a looming economic crisis and rapid advances in transformative technologies such as generative AI have had a significant impact on cybersecurity. This is evidenced in the World Economic Forum report, Global Cybersecurity Outlook 2023, where the vast majority of cyber and business leaders think it “moderately likely” or “very likely” that global geopolitical instability will lead to a far-reaching, catastrophic cyber event in the next two years.

name: Data Science & Analytics Expo
description: The Data Science & Analytics Technologies track delves into the cutting-edge tools, technologies, and methodologies that data scientists use to unlock deeper insights and drive value from their data. Presentations will highlight the shift towards scalable platforms and personalized analytics solutions, explore strategies for building data-driven organizations, and examine innovative approaches to data management and real-time analytics. We will also address how to frame critical questions that guide data investigations, assess the tangible impacts of data science in practical settings, and showcase the latest advancements in data science tools and their applications. Join us to explore how these technologies are transforming research and decision-making in the life sciences.
